여러분 여기가 어딘가요? Where are we? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
여기 어딘가에 있을 것 같은데... I think someone is here. 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 웹드라마 [기적 소녀 4화] 절대 뒤돌아 보지마!

vlive.english: That my ring is somewhere in this world.

vlive.korean: 지금 과거... 과거로 돌아간 건가요? 어딘가요, 지금? What do you see? Do you see your past? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 아스트로 극장
vlive.english: What do you see? Do you see your past?

examples.korean: It has to go someplace. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것이 어딘가에 들어가야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It has to go someplace. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There’s a pen kicking around on my desk somewhere. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 책상 어딘가에 안 쓰고 돌아다니는 펜이 하나 있어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There’s a pen kicking around on my desk somewhere. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Somewhere out there was a desperate man, cold, hungry, hunted. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저기 바깥 어딘가에 춥고 배고픈 가운데 쫓기는 신세로 자포자기의 심정에 빠진 한 남자가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Somewhere out there was a desperate man, cold, hungry, hunted. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: After ten years travelling the world, she felt it was time to put down roots somewhere. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 10년 동안 세계를 돌아다니며 여행을 한 후 그녀는 이제 어딘가에 뿌리를 내려야겠다는 생각이 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After ten years travelling the world, she felt it was time to put down roots somewhere. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Morality, like art, means drawing a line someplace. (Oscar Wilde) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도덕은 미술과 같이 어딘가에 선을 긋는 것이다. (오스카 와일드, 자기관리명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Morality, like art, means drawing a line someplace. (Oscar Wilde) Add to Wordbook
